description: Evaluates a machine learning model using k-fold cross-validation. The training data is split into k folds, and the model is trained k times, each time using k-1 folds for training and the remaining fold for validation. Returns aggregated performance metrics across all folds.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: An untrained machine learning model object that will be trained and evaluated.

parameters.name: training_data
parameters.description: Training samples. Can be provided as a URL to a data file, a local file path, or an inline data object depending on the backend implementation.

parameters.name: folds
parameters.description: Number of folds for cross-validation. Common values are 5 or 10.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Name of the target/label column in the data.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility of fold splits and model training.

returns.description: Cross-validation results including aggregated performance metrics across all folds.

metrics.description: Aggregated performance metrics (accuracy, kappa, etc.) across all folds.
